https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/slLfCvoDbC20IsXPZCGsXuyeaqp.jpg The story is centered on Lal Krishna Viradiar (Suresh Gopi), the enigmatic criminal lawyer with an even more enigmatic mission. Lal Krishna helps out hardened criminals to get away from the courts. But later he pursues and takes them out in a bizarre show of vigilante justice. Chinthamani Kolacase
